snippet: A small water agency has moved to force state agencies that control distribution to deprive some users of their supplies.
abstract: Small water agency Carlsbad Irrigation District in southern New Mexico is pressing its case to force state authorities to institute 'priority call' on Pecos River water supplies; move would re-assign water based on seniority in longstanding priority list, depriving some users while rescuing Carlsbad farmers from severe drought.
lead_paragraph: A small water agency has moved to force state agencies that control distribution to deprive some users of their supplies.

headline.seo: Amid Drought, Water Board in New Mexico Confronts State Over Supply
headline.main: Amid Drought, Water Board in New Mexico Confronts State Over Supply
headline.print_headline: Amid Drought, Water Board in New Mexico Confronts State Over Supply
